  • Join Us

Brazilian IT Professionals

We are a group dedicated to Brazilian IT professionals living or looking for opportunities in Canada.

Our goal is to create a supportive network of professionals interested in exchanging information and experiences. Presently, the group has over 1600 members.

Other Groups

There are other communities and groups dedicated to the Brazilian IT professionals all over the country. Most of them are focused on cities or provinces. We prepared you a list as you might want to join them as well.
